title: Settings
description: You can make your personal settings and system settings of Liman through this page.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: You can change your username, e-mail address and password, and view details such as your last login date and IP address.

validations.name: Name and surname must be at least 3 characters.
validations.email: Please enter a valid e-mail address.

toasts.success: Your information has been successfully edited. You must log in again to see the changes.
toasts.error: An error occurred while editing your information.

form.title: Profile Information
form.description: You can update your username, e-mail address and password from this section.
form.name: Name Surname

auth_log.title: Login Records
auth_log.description: You can view the login records made to your account along with their IP addresses from this section.

vault.title: Vault
vault.description: You can change the extension settings on the servers, your passwords, and the values ​​entered by other users.

edit.success_msg: The data has been edited successfully.
edit.error_msg: An error occurred while editing data.
edit.confirm_msg: Old data content will be deleted and new data will be added.

delete.success_msg: The data has been deleted successfully.
delete.error_msg: An error occurred while deleting data.
delete.confirm_msg: The selected data will be completely deleted from the Liman system. Do you want to continue?

create.description: You can add settings for the selected user using this window.

toasts.error_msg: An error occurred while creating the setting.

validation.key: The key field cannot be empty.
validation.value: The value field cannot be empty.

key.description: You can add a connection key to the server using this window.

toasts.error_msg: An error occurred while creating the setting.

validation.type: You must choose the key type.
validation.port: The connection port cannot be longer than 5 characters.
validation.port_nonempty: The connection port cannot be empty.

tokens.title: Personal Access Keys
tokens.description: You can use external API ends provided by Liman by creating personal access keys.

toasts.delete_success: The key has been deleted successfully.
toasts.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the key.
toasts.create_success: The key has been created successfully.
toasts.create_error: An error occurred while creating the key.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: The selected external notification ({{token}}) will be completely deleted from the Liman system. As a result of this process, your notification reception may be interrupted. Do you want to continue?

tokens.name: Name

validation.name: Access key name cannot be empty.
validation.ip_range: The allowed IP address cannot be empty.

create.title: Create Access Key
create.description: You can create a new access key using this window.
create.subtext: You can restrict access by typing a subnet address or IP address that you want to allow in this section. When you type -1, the restriction is removed. For example: 192.168.1.0/24
create.alert_description: Do not share this token with anyone. They can perform transactions on the Port system on your behalf.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Through this page, you can manage the extensions on your system, update their versions and upload new extensions.

upload.title: Upload Extension
upload.description: We do not recommend uploading .zip files that you do not trust.
upload.dialog_description: This extension file appears to be unsigned. Are you sure you want to install this extension?
upload.file_too_large: File size cannot be larger than 99 MB.

actions.download_error: An error occurred while downloading the extension.

license.title: Add License
license.description: Enter the licence provided by HAVELSAN A.Ş. for your extension.
license.error_msg: An error occurred while adding the license.

delete_dialog.success_msg: The extension has been deleted successfully.
delete_dialog.error_msg: An error occurred while deleting the extension.
delete_dialog.title: Are you sure?
delete_dialog.description: The selected extension ({{extension}}) will be completely removed from the Liman system. As a result of this process, you may lose your case data and extension permissions. Do you want to continue?

users.title: Users
users.description: Through this page you can add roles to users, edit user profiles and add new ones.
users.name: Name Surname

toasts.success_msg: The user has been created successfully.
toasts.edit_success_msg: The user has been edited successfully.
toasts.error_msg: An error occurred while creating the user.
toasts.edit_error_msg: An error occurred while editing the user.

validation.n_min: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.n_max: Name must be at most 50 characters.
validation.name_min: Username must be at least 2 characters.
validation.name_max: Username must be at most 50 characters.
validation.email: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
validation.password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.password_max: Password must be at most 50 characters.

create.title: Add User
create.description: You can create a new user using this window.

edit.title: Edit User
edit.description: You can edit the user's information using this window.

auth_log.title: Login Records
auth_log.description: You can examine all users logged in to Liman in detail.
auth_log.desc2: You can view the user's login records in detail.

delete.success: The user has been deleted successfully.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the user.
delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.subtext: The selected user ({{username}}) will be completely deleted from the Liman system. As a result of this process, you may lose your case data and extension permissions. Do you want to continue?

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: You can organize users' access authorization levels in detail based on groups and individuals.

validation.name: The role name cannot be empty.

create.success: The role has been created successfully.
create.error: An error occurred while creating the role.
create.title: Create Role
create.description: As a result of this process, a role will be created in your system and you will be directed to the editing page.
create.name: Role Name

roles.name: Role Name

details.title: Detailed Role List
details.description: You can view all roles and permissions created on the database by performing detailed filtering.
details.download_error: An error occurred while downloading the report.

actions.title: Are you sure?
actions.subtext: The selected role ({{role_name}}) will be completely removed from the port system. Do you want to continue?
actions.success: The role has been deleted successfully.
actions.error: An error occurred while deleting the role.

users.title: Users
users.description: Determine which users will have this role.
users.left: Users who do not have this role
users.error: An error occurred while updating users.

views.title: View Permissions
views.description: Modify how users see the layout in Liman.
views.error: An error occurred while updating view permissions.
views.sidebar_description: Determine how the sidebar will appear to users with the role.
views.dashboard_description: Select which widgets users should see on the dashboard.
views.redirect_description: Determine the extension to which users will be redirected when they log in to Liman. Add this role to users carefully.
views.redirect_placeholder: Select the extension to be redirected

liman.title: Liman Permissions
liman.success: Liman permissions have been updated successfully.
liman.error: An error occurred while updating Liman permissions.

servers.title: Server Permissions
servers.description: Determine which servers this role can access.
servers.success: The servers have been updated successfully.
servers.error: An error occurred while updating the servers.

extensions.title: Extension Permissions
extensions.description: Determine which extensions this role can access.
extensions.error: An error occurred while updating extensions.

functions.title: Function Permissions
functions.description: You can manage the internal permissions of extensions in detail through this page.
functions.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting function permissions.

delete_dialog.title: Are you sure?
delete_dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. The selected permissions will be removed, do you want to continue?

assign.title: Add Permission
assign.description: Using this window, you can assign internal permissions of extensions to this role.
assign.success: Function permissions have been added successfully.
assign.error: An error occurred while adding function permissions.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Set the custom data that this role will share with the extension.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. The selected data will be removed, do you want to continue?
delete.success: Private data has been deleted successfully.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting private data.

create.success: Private data has been created successfully.
create.error: An error occurred while creating private data.
create.title: Create Private Data
create.description: As a result of this process, private data will be created on the role.

email.title: E-mail
email.description: You can adjust and test the e-mail sending settings of the system in detail on this page.

toasts.success: Mail settings have been updated successfully.

host.label: Server Address
host.subtext: Your email server address must be resolvable by Liman.

port.label: Server Port
port.subtext: The port through which the connection to your email server will be established. For SMTP, you can enter one of the options 25, 465 or 587.

username.label: User Name
username.subtext: You can enter a username that is authorized to send on your email server.

password.label: Password
password.subtext: Password of the user you entered.

encryption.label: Encryption Type
encryption.subtext: You can choose TLS, SSL or neither.

active.label: Activate e-mail sending
active.subtext: When you activate e-mail sending, you can receive various informative e-mails from the Liman.

external_notifications.title: External Notifications
external_notifications.description: You can ensure that extensions servers and external applications send notifications to Liman by setting an IP restriction.

toasts.success: The external notification has been deleted successfully.
toasts.error: An error occurred while deleting an external notification.

actions.confirm_delete: The selected external notification ({{external_notification}}) will be permanently deleted from the Liman system. This process may cause interruptions in your notifications. Do you want to continue?

external_notifications.name: Name

validation.name: External declaration name cannot be empty.

toasts.success: The external notification has been created successfully.
toasts.error: An error occurred while creating the external notification.

create.title: Create External Notification
create.description: As a result of this process, an external notification will be created in your system.
create.alert_description: Do not share this token with anyone you do not trust. Your external applications can send notifications to Liman using this token.
create.name: External Declaration Name
create.subtext:
You can restrict access by typing a subnet address or IP address that you want to allow in this section.
For example: 192.168.1.0/24

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: You can observe your system and extension subscriptions and renewals through this page.
subscriptions.open_source_warning: You are using the open source support package.

license_dialog.error: An error occurred while adding the license.
license_dialog.title: Add License
license_dialog.description: Enter the license given to you by HAVELSAN A.Ş. for Liman in this section.

subcard.error: An error occurred while adding the license.
subcard.title: Add License
subcard.description: Enter the license given to you by HAVELSAN A.Ş. for your extension in this section.

access.title: Access
access.description: Allows you to configure the login tools that can be used to log in. You can set up Keycloak and LDAP logins on this page.

audit.title: Access Logs
audit.description: You can observe in detail the operations performed by users in Liman other than extensions on this page.

messages.ROLE_EDIT: Role edited, {{changed_count}} objects changed. See request details.

formScema.client_id: Client ID field cannot be empty.
formScema.client_secret: Client Secret field cannot be empty.
formScema.redirect_uri: Redirect URI field cannot be empty.
formScema.base_url: Base URL field cannot be empty.

fail.title: Error
fail.description: An error occurred while saving Keycloak settings.

page_header.title: Keycloak
page_header.description: You can enable user login to Liman using the Keycloak auth gateway.

form.info_id: The Client ID value is the ID value given for the client you created on Keycloak.
form.info_secret: The Client Secret value is the secret value generated for the client you created on Keycloak.
form.redirect_info: The Redirect URL value should be your Liman URL /keycloak/callback and you should specify this value in the allowed redirect URLs section of your client.
form.base_info: The Base URL value is your Keycloak URL.
form.realm_info: The Realm value is the name of the realm you created on Keycloak.
form.integration_info: When you activate integration, users on your Keycloak server will be able to log in to Liman.

formScema.issuer_url: OIDC Issuer URL field cannot be empty.
formScema.client_id: Client ID field cannot be empty.
formScema.client_secret: Client Secret field cannot be empty.
formScema.redirect_uri: Redirect URI field cannot be empty.
formScema.auth_endpoint: Authorization Endpoint field cannot be empty.
formScema.userinfo_endpoint: Userinfo Endpoint field cannot be empty.
formScema.token_endpoint: Token Endpoint field cannot be empty.

fail.title: Error
fail.description: An error occurred while saving OIDC settings.

page_header.title: OIDC
page_header.description: You can enable user login to Liman using any OIDC provider like Keycloak, Auth0, etc.

form.issuer_url_info: The URL of your OIDC provider's issuer endpoint (e.g., https://your-oidc-provider.com/realms/your-realm).
form.client_id_info: The client ID registered with your OIDC provider.
form.client_secret_info: The client secret registered with your OIDC provider. Keep this secure and do not expose it publicly.
form.redirect_uri_info: The redirect URI configured in your OIDC provider. This should match the callback URL set in your OIDC provider's client configuration.
form.auth_endpoint_info: The endpoint used for user authentication (e.g., /authorize). This is typically the authorization endpoint of your OIDC provider.
form.userinfo_endpoint_info: The endpoint used to retrieve user information after authentication (e.g., /userinfo).
form.token_endpoint_info: The endpoint used to exchange authorization codes for access tokens (e.g., /oauth/token).
form.integration_info: When you activate integration, users on your OIDC provider will be able to log in to Liman.

formScema.address: LDAP server address cannot be empty.
formScema.objectguid: Write the name of the objectguid field in your LDAP schema.
formScema.mail: Write the name of the mail field in your LDAP schema.

success.title: Success
success.description: LDAP connection settings have been saved successfully.

fail.title: Error
fail.description: An error occurred while saving LDAP connection settings.

page_header.title: LDAP Connection
page_header.description: You can use LDAP connection when logging in to Liman and configure access permissions in detail.

forms.server_info: Enter the connection address of the active directory, Samba or LDAP provider you are using. This connection address must be resolvable by your Liman server.
forms.object_guid_info: Write the name of the objectguid field that is actively used in your LDAP schema. Although the value of this field is usually objectguid, it may vary in some installations.
forms.mail_info: Write the name of the mail field that is actively used in your LDAP schema. Although the value of this field is usually mail, it may vary in some installations.
forms.integration_info: When you activate integration, LDAP users you have granted permission to will be able to log in to Liman using their usernames.

permissions.title: LDAP Access Permissions
permissions.description: You can use this page to set in detail which LDAP groups and users can or cannot log in to Liman.
permissions.login_success: Login successful, you can perform your operations.
permissions.login_error: Login failed, please check your information.
permissions.user_success: User list has been updated successfully.
permissions.user_error: User list could not be updated.
permissions.group_success: Group list has been updated successfully.
permissions.group_error: Group list could not be updated.
permissions.login_description: Log in with an LDAP user who has the authority to query users and groups to edit LDAP access permissions.

health.title: Health Status
health.description: You can view the health status of the Liman Central Management System and easily apply security improvement recommendations.
health.admin_account_description: For your security, we recommend that you remove the administrator@liman.dev account that comes as default. Using the default account carries the risk of causing situations such as bruteforce.
health.dns_check_description: You need to configure DNS to resolve external internet and IP addresses on your network for your Liman server.
health.ssl_check_description: The certificate defined on your Liman server is about to expire. It is recommended that you renew it.
health.ssl_self_description: We have detected that you are using a self-signed certificate. If you have a wildcard certificate that you use in your organization, we recommend that you make the definition through HAVELSAN A.Ş.
health.high_availability_service_description: Liman's High Availability service is not active. If this service is not activated, Liman will not be able to work redundantly in case of a server-related problem.
health.manual_sync_success: The synchronization request has been sent. The servers will run synchronization between each other.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: You can make changes to the system's DNS settings, certificate installations, and log redirections from this page.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: You can add the certificates that the Liman server will accept from here.

retrieve.fetch_error: An error occurred while retrieving certificate details.
retrieve.error: An error occurred while creating the certificate.
retrieve.title: Add Certificate
retrieve.description: The certificate of the server for which you provide the hostname and port information will be transferred to the Liman system.
retrieve.empty_state: Enter connection details and fetch certificate information

details.title: Certificate Details
details.description: You can view detailed information about the selected certificate.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: The selected certificate ({{name}}) will be completely deleted from the Liman system. Access to extensions may be interrupted as a result of this operation. Do you want to continue?
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the certificate.

dns.title: DNS Settings
dns.description: You can make DNS settings that allow Liman to resolve endpoints to connect and active directory servers.
dns.error: An error occurred while updating DNS settings.

logrotation.title: Log Redirection
logrotation.description: Allows you to redirect important system logs and messages of Liman through rsyslog.
logrotation.error: An error occurred while updating log redirection settings.

tweaks.title: Tweaks
tweaks.description: You can change the fine-tuning settings related to Liman from this page.
tweaks.error: An error occurred while saving tweaks.

APP_LANG.label: System Language
APP_LANG.subtext: You can change the default system language by changing between Turkish, English, and German options.

OTP_ENABLED.label: Two-Factor Authentication
OTP_ENABLED.subtext: When activated, all users will log in by receiving codes through the two-factor authentication application you prefer.

APP_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.label: System Email
APP_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.subtext: The email address you enter in this field will be used by Liman to send you notifications and alerts.

APP_URL.label: Application Address
APP_URL.subtext: The address of the Liman system to be added in emails and notifications.

EXTENSION_TIMEOUT.label: Extension Request Timeout
EXTENSION_TIMEOUT.subtext: The timeout period to be used in requests sent by Liman to extensions.

APP_DEBUG.label: Developer Mode
APP_DEBUG.subtext: When activated, the Liman system will send more detailed logs and change error messages.

EXTENSION_DEVELOPER_MODE.label: Extension Developer Mode
EXTENSION_DEVELOPER_MODE.subtext: When activated, more detailed error messages and logs will be sent for extension developers.

NEW_LOG_LEVEL.label: Logging Level
NEW_LOG_LEVEL.subtext: You can change Liman's logging behavior through this section.

LDAP_IGNORE_CERT.label: Disable LDAP Certificate Check
LDAP_IGNORE_CERT.subtext: When activated, you can connect to LDAP servers without the need to add a certificate to the system. You will need to create a file named .ignoreme in the extension folder.

JWT_TTL.label: Default Session Time (Minutes)
JWT_TTL.subtext: The default session time to be used in Liman.

edit.title: Edit Server
edit.description: You can edit the visible name and IP address of your server from this section.

form.name: Name
form.shared_key_message: If there is a key attached to this server, it allows sharing with other users.

edit.error_msg: An error occurred while editing the server.

delete_dialog.error_msg: An error occurred while deleting the server.
delete_dialog.title: Are you sure?
delete_dialog.description: The selected server ({{server}}) will be completely removed from the Liman system. Do you want to continue?
